message: Let's split it evenly.  Fair is fair, right?
I want a bit more than half. You'll still get a good amount, and it's better than nothing!
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take more than half. Let's end this fairly.
I see you're willing to compromise, but I'm not backing down. This is my new offer. The money is worth less to you now, so you should be more eager to settle!
Okay, I'm giving in. This is the best I can do, considering how much the money is losing value.
